description: High severity SIEM alert: Microsoft Defender Antivirus detected malware HackTool:PowerShell/Mimikatz.F, which can potentially compromise the system and lead to unauthorized access or data theft.
Microsoft Defender Antivirus detected malware (HackTool:PowerShell/Mimikatz) on the host NUW-BEST-16, potentially compromising the system and user testuser33. This poses a high risk to the network.
